name: Tax Invasion
description:
Aliens from outer space have come to invade Earth to steal all the money and citizens. The Earth's army has transformed into mindless money-making slaves. Join Nene on the adventure to stop the invader from turning Earth into money.

Controls:

Nintendo Switch Pro Controller:

A - shooting bullets.

B - shooting bombs

X - reloading bullets.

Y - reloading bombs.

L - dash Left.

R - dash Right.

R2 - Pause.

Keyboard:

X - shooting bullets

Z - shooting bombs.

S - reloading bullets

A - reloading bombs

Q  - dash left

W - dash right

R - Pause

Please comment on your critique below. Thank you.
